mapper.select: SELECT * FROM seat WHERE comp_seq = #{param} ORDER BY seat_seq
mapper.update: UPDATE SEAT SET seat_id = '[X]' || (select seat_id from seat where seat_seq = ${seat_seq}) WHERE seat_seq = #{seat_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT menu_seq , comp_seq , menu_sellFlag , menu_name , menu_price , menu_category FROM MENU WHERE comp_seq = #{comp_seq}

SELECT expense_seq , comp_seq , expense_type , to_char(expense_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as expense_date , expense_description , expense_amount FROM expense WHERE comp_seq = #{comp_seq} and expense_date between to_date(#{month} || '-01', 'yyyy-mm-dd') and last_day(to_date(#{month}, 'yyyy-mm'))

SELECT to_char(payment_time, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as pmt_date , to_char(payment_time, 'hh24:mi:ss') as pmt_time , payment_amount as pmt_amount , rownum FROM payment p LEFT JOIN sales_state s ON p.sales_state_seq = s.sales_state_seq WHERE s.comp_seq = #{comp_seq} and payment_time like to_date(#{inqdate}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') and payment_type = 1 ORDER BY pmt_time asc
